mapper.update: update Resume set name = #{name}, languageId = #{languageId}, updateTime = now() where resumeId = #{resumeId}
mapper.delete: update Resume set yn = 0 where resumeId = #{resumeId}
update Resume set yn = 1 where resumeId = #{resumeId}
mapper.select: select * from Resume where resumeId = #{value} and yn = 1
